stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains Austrian foreign minister Klemens von Metternichâ€™s purpose in setting up the Concert of Europe?

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of conservatism in the nineteenth century.

choicesHtml: To make Austria the strongest military power in Europe
To support cultural improvements as a way of promoting nationalism
To suppress lingering revolutionary sentiment in Europe
To bring about the unification of Germany
